thread.title: This Dog’s Intense Reaction To Catching A Toy Got An Epic Photoshop Makeover
thread.title_full: This Dog’s Intense Reaction To Catching A Toy Got An Epic Photoshop Makeover

author: Robert Anthony
title: This Dog’s Intense Reaction To Catching A Toy Got An Epic Photoshop Makeover
text:
Like Us On Facebook Like Us On Facebook 
When the internet gets ahold of a photo of a cute dog’s priceless facial expression, you can expect an epic Photoshop battle to take place just before it goes viral. 
That’s exactly what happened after a Reddit user shared a photo of their dog’s intense face while playing with a toy. Redditor Rocklou uploaded a photo captioned, “dog trying to catch toy with his paws.” 
Seemingly, that’s all the internet really needs in order to spark a Photoshop editing battle we’ll never forget. Giphy 
People were pretty creative as they worked a spooked pup into a bunch of different, random backdrops. Here’s Reddit user Rocklou’s original photo of his dog’s crazy facial expression while attempting to catch a toy with his paws. Reddit Once fellow Redditors got their paws on the photo, the race was on. Reddit Who will craft the best edit of an already epic photo?! Reddit It’s a close call… Reddit Some of these are just TOO good. Reddit Who knew this dog was at one of President Trump’s rallies? Reddit Apparently, he starred in the “Scooby-Doo” movie, too. Reddit When he’s not being scared with Shaggy and Trump, he’s brawling on the ice during hockey games. Reddit Lastly, my personal favorite: the aftermath of that hockey fight. Reddit 
You can always count on the skillful photoshoppers out there to get to work as soon as they come across a photo that’s already wacky enough. 
Hey, I’m not complaining. As a matter of fact, I want MORE. Luckily, a generous Photoshop warrior out there went the extra mile and edited the dog into a GIF I’ll probably have saved on my computer for decades. 
It’s that damn good… Without further ado, I present to you “Holy Shit, I’m About to Get Knocked the Fuck Out” dog: Reddit 
Don’t you just LOVE the internet? How To Workout With Your Dog
